# Third-Party Licenses

This project incorporates third-party components or data that are licensed under different terms.

## factoriolab-zmd

**Repository:** https://github.com/Bakingss/factoriolab-zmd

**License:** MIT License

**Copyright:** Copyright (c) 2020-2024 Doug Broad

**Description:**
This project uses data generation tools and concepts from factoriolab-zmd. The Arknights:Endfield data pack was created using tools and methodologies derived from this project.

### Source Location

The factoriolab-zmd source code can be found at:
https://github.com/Bakingss/factoriolab-zmd

Local copy available at: `D:\Projcets\factoriolab-zmd`

## Arknights:Endfield Data

**Source Game:** Arknights:Endfield by Hypergryph

**Data Pack Location:** `public/packs/aef/`

**Note:** The Arknights:Endfield data pack contains game data extracted from the game Arknights:Endfield. This data is used for informational purposes only and remains the property of Hypergryph.
